contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=May 2008}} '''Alyattes I''' was the twenty-third king of [[Lydia]], and twentieth king of the Heraclid dynasty; see [[List of Kings of Lydia]]. He was succeeded by his son, [[Meles of Lydia|Meles]]. ([[Herodotus]]) He is believed to have reigned between 759 and 745 BC. {{S-start}} {{Succession box|title=[[Kings of Lydia|King of Lydia]]|before=[[Ardys I]]|after=[[Meles of Lydia|Meles]]|years=759–745 BC}} {{s-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Alyattes 01 | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = King of Lydia | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Alyattes 01}} [[Category:Kings of Lydia]] [[Category:8th-century BC deaths]] [[Category:Year of birth unknown]] {{Ancient-Greece-bio-stub}} {{Greece-royal-stub}} {{MEast-royal-stub}}
